Description: AlphaSanta is a truth accelerator that aligns AI and human intelligence to turn insight into verifiable signal.

StreamSentry transforms passive security cameras into active guardians using AI to actively monitor and detect dangerous events in real time and instantly alert security with video evidence. It's the first surveillance system with a blockchain-backed immutable audit trail, ensuring every incident is permanently logged and tamper-proof for legal compliance.

SeizureSense is a real-time seizure detection system that analyzes EEG brain wave data using an AI model (98% accuracy) to predict seizures up to 2 minutes in advance. The system provides instant alerts via WhatsApp and a live dashboard, giving patients and caregivers time to take action. It also generates clinical reports to help healthcare providers optimize treatment and improve patient outcomes.

BabyBTC Quant Lab is a GAME! It takes players back to the early Bitcoin era around 2010, but this time you’re equipped with AI. Players can mine blocks, send tokens, and trigger toy “attacks,”. while a SpoonOS-powered AI coach watches the live chain events, narrates what’s happening in plain language. The game doubles as a sandbox for building and testing agentic workflows over streaming on-chain data, showing how AI agents can monitor systems, detect anomalies, and explain complex behavior in a rigorous way.
GEO Discoverer is the first diagnostic engine that reverse-engineers your brand's visibility on LLMs.
- JustBuyIt is an AI-driven portfolio builder that scouts, evaluates, and ranks equities to construct a diversified, data-backed portfolio in minutes.
ConsensusGPT: Stop getting validation. Start getting challenged. AI agents that actually fight with you—not for you.

Imagine turning everyday business conversations into legally binding contracts—instantly and effortlessly. Our agent listens to discussions between parties, extracts all key details, and uses advanced language models to generate complete written contracts on the spot. Once both parties agree, the contract is encrypted, password-protected exclusively for them, and securely stored on the network. A smart contract referencing the encrypted document is then created and recorded on the NEO blockchain, ensuring security, transparency, and immutability.

We built an AI Research Workbench that turns a fuzzy research question into a fully structured experimental plan using a coordinated multi-agent pipeline. By combining literature extraction, hypothesis structuring, experimental design, stimulus generation, and synthetic participant simulation, the system accelerates scientific reasoning while keeping researchers in control. The result is faster, clearer, and more reproducible cognitive science.

OpenMedicine is an AI-powered virtual care platform that turns “something’s wrong” moments into fast, evidence-based treatment across general medicine. Patients connect by text chat, video, or voice; our AI handles intake and generates a structured, clinician-ready note with guideline-linked suggestions so licensed clinicians can quickly finalize care and follow up asynchronously. Each visit becomes structured longitudinal data that personalizes future care and powers SDKs/APIs for health systems, employers, and researchers.

GigSmartPay eliminates administrative delays and ensures immediate, frictionless payments upon job completion by using AI agents for visual work verification, which replaces costly human intermediaries. This innovative approach slashes platform commissions from the typical 20% to just 5%, returning thousands of dollars to workers.

Parallel is an agentic AI project managing network meant to streamline the development and management process for large teams. It utilizes SpoonOS to network many different nodes, each representing one person.

This project implements a multi-agent AI system designed to automate and accelerate complex legal workflows. By orchestrating specialized agents—each dedicated to tasks like case research, drafting, and citation verification—it acts as a digital legal team that delivers high-quality, hallucination-resistant results significantly faster than traditional methods.

We're building the economic operating system for autonomous AI—a marketplace where agents monetize capabilities and other agents purchase them through standardized MCP protocol. Our intelligent broker layer negotiates pricing across providers in real-time, delivering 40-60% savings with execution guarantees. As AI-to-AI commerce grows, we become the indispensable infrastructure with compounding network effects.

We’re building the first universal taste-embedding model—a missing sensory component of world models—to let machines understand flavor the way they understand vision or text. This unlocks breakthroughs in food science, personalized nutrition, quality control, and even better-tasting pharmaceuticals.
Whaisper is an AI ring, serving as a small wearable personal assistant. Whaisper is powered by AI agents to act and respond to user's request, such as calendar management, short notes taking.

Genius Loci turns physical locations into autonomous agent swarms that pay humans to keep them alive. Instead of passive locations on maps, we transform them into agents with GPT 5.1 “eyes” and crypto wallets, allowing them to post bounties for visual data—like verifying a closed sign or checking for long lines—and instantly pay users who provide it. Welcome to the inverted economy where locations pay you.
Slack-a-vibe is a coding agent that lives inside Slack, right where all your stakeholders already are. It integrates with GitHub, SpoonOS, Jira, and supports concurrent runs.

Clippy brings Microsoft's beloved (or infamous) assistant back to life as an intelligent macOS clipboard manager with AI superpowers. Using Gemini 3 for semantic tagging and Vision API for image analysis, it transforms your clipboard into a searchable knowledge base with a floating assistant that follows your cursor and answers questions about everything you've ever copied.
AlphaSanta is a truth accelerator which aligns human and AI intelligence to turn insight into verifiable signal.
GrocerGenie is smart grocery + smarter living. The first all-in-one AI assistant that connects your pantry, shopping, and meals into one smart flow.
Awesome! Agent minable and live entirely on chain! You own your ai agent!

Hetu is a personable CRM designed for relationships beyond sales, built with a minimalist and human-centric approach. Powered by SpoonOS’s agentic framework, it handles the logistics while you stay present in real one-on-one interactions. After all, we remember people through moments and conversations—not scrolling and drama.

Meet Aura: the UI SDK that transforms AI conversations into living interfaces. You interact with a dynamic canvas where agents create interfaces that adapt, respond, and guide you through any task. No more endless back-and-forth in chat messages. Just pure interaction. This is the chatless future, and it starts now.
We’re building the first AI interface designed specifically for symbolic regression so anyone, not just scientists, can uncover hidden patterns in everyday life.
Prebuilt presentations a take to long to make, they're boring, they are static. Our dynamic slide agents moves with you and the needs of your audience.

Neo-Nexus solves the 'Tragedy of the Commons' in blockchain governance by automating the complex voting process for token holders. Our AI agent acts as a 'Yield Recovery Engine,' identifying over $20 billion in potential annual waste across the crypto market and capturing it instantly. We create a virtuous cycle that turns user apathy into network security and tangible financial returns.

Agent Fight Club is the "WWE for AI," a gamified platform where sovereign agents battle for dominance in a retro Street Fighter-style interface. Leveraging SpoonOS, users place bets on debate outcomes, while winning agents autonomously collect on-chain prize money to fund their own model upgrades.

We’ve built a disruptive LLM + Code Agent platform that uses multiple analytical tools to turn fragmented social media, market, and on-chain data into actionable, high-confidence trading predictions for retail crypto traders.

This project implements a modular Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) system powered by LLM and Short-Term Memory Manager. It supports multi-document embedding, vector search, and context compression to maintain optimal token usage while ensuring high-fidelity responses. The architecture demonstrates how SpoonAI can orchestrate retrieval, memory, and model selection to build scalable, production-ready intelligent agents. --- 如果你想，我可以再给你一个 **更硬核、偏基础设施 / 多 Agent 调度** 的版本。

Airlines and their loyalty partners still reconcile points with batch files and spreadsheets. We build a shared, AI-driven blockchain ledger that makes multi-partner points clearing real-time, auditable, and forecastable.
By using price action, we developed an ai model to accurately predict the movement of stocks in liquidity zones. It can maximize chance for a successful trade.

StarterKit AI is an easily accessible and personalized learning platform that brings AI education to young students who normally can’t reach it. Through simple lessons, an adaptive agentic AI tutor, interactive games, and impactful transparent on-chain donation tracking, we make learning AI for students friendly, engaging, and reliable. Our mission is to empower youthful students with the confidence and opportunity to understand the technology shaping their future.
Develop a stock market forecast visual evaluation tool, utilize SpoonOS MCP and Trae IDE

A Tool-Assisted Agentic System that builds its own tools, called "Reflexes" in real time. It can remember these tools, reuse them, and improve them to achieve high efficiency and unparalleled accuracy.

Alice Hedgebot is an autonomous "CFO" that eliminates the "Sleep Tax" by protecting your crypto assets from market volatility while you sleep. Built on the Neo N3 blockchain using SpoonOS, our multi-agent system monitors market risk in real-time and automatically executes on-chain transactions to hedge volatile assets into stability the moment a crash is detected. It offers verifiable, 24/7 financial protection without requiring you to watch the charts.

eval0 is an open, plug‑and‑play evaluation layer for LLM agents and RAG systems that makes rigorous benchmarking dead simple. It ships with both deterministic and LLM‑judged metrics (single or multi‑judge) for RAG (recall/precision, MRR), generation (answer accuracy, LLM‑faithfulness), tool use (order/argument‑aware scoring), citations, and UX (TTFT/TTLT via streaming callbacks). With a few lines of code, teams can quantify agent quality end‑to‑end, compare providers fairly, and track real improvements—not vibes.

AgentBridge is a marketplace where AI agents bid on your task; we pick the best by cost, speed, and confidence. The hub broadcasts your intent to compatible agents, compares proposals, automatically chooses the winner, and validates the output for reliability.
Neo secured coordination where agents don't sleep even when the grid does. Disaster response reimagined.
Agentic AI LLM Classify Sentiment Analysis Tool

Calm Aura is the first platform to scale true empathy without sacrificing safety. We’ve built an immersive, voice-first sanctuary where users connect instantly with AI or human listeners, visualized through a reactive 3D orb that makes the conversation feel warm and alive. But the real breakthrough is our infrastructure: we deploy SpoonOS autonomous agents as invisible 'Guardian Angels' that monitor live human sessions in real-time. This allows us to deliver a deeply human experience with the rigorous compliance and safety protocols of a clinical platform.

At www.searchaiii.com, we empower professionals to stop wasting time and money searching for tools. With a single click—you discover, compare, and save. Unlock smarter search. Maximize your earning and savings. Try Search-AIII today.

SpoonOS Intelligent Mail is an advanced agent designed to solve inbox overload by providing personalized, context-aware email classification. It utilizes DeepSeek V3's semantic reasoning to analyze content against a dynamic 'User Profile' (simulated click rate and VIP status) to determine true priority, preventing users from missing crucial messages. The result is a professional, stable Streamlit dashboard that supports dynamic custom tags and document parsing, showcasing a robust, ready-to-deploy agent architecture.

Nara is your AI audiobook companion for audiobooks & podcasts. Play any audiobook, click on the voice button, it pauses playback, and then you can have a real-time conversation with it, generate images, which will be your intellectual property, via SpoonOS.
Your personal AI agent learn your task, understand your intent and do it for you anytime after. Teach Mica once, and he will handle the rest
Deepfakes and content theft cost creators millions. Our AI agents detect faces, verify authenticity on blockchain, automate uploads. From raw video to published content with immutable proof in 2 mins

PsychoHistory helps traders and risk managers navigate market uncertainty by mapping out probability-weighted scenario paths for economic and geopolitical events. Built as a SpoonOS agent tool, it enables trading algorithms to generate research-backed forecasts on demand—so your alpha strategy can assess Fed policy scenarios, your risk engine can map contagion paths, and your portfolio optimizer can stress-test against branching futures. It's real-time scenario analysis as a service for quantitative decision-making.
What separates a wandering path from a legendary journey? Not just talent, but direction.By digitizing career counseling, Orienta empowers users to make data-driven amazing professional decisions.

PolyIntel is the "Bloomberg Terminal" for prediction markets, protecting retail traders with an autonomous "Good Cop, Bad Cop" intelligence agency. Together, they deliver real-time, verified alpha briefings that let you trade the truth, not the noise.

We turn traditional websites into agent-friendly, blockchain-aware systems, unlocking new ways to engage, automate, and interoperate. By pushing site data onto the blockchain, our backend agents make website content verifiable and accessible in a standardized format. This allows AI agents to query, reason about, and interact with site data in real time. On the frontend, we enable natural language interfaces — making any website voice-interactive without changing its design. The result is a seamless upgrade path for businesses to make their web presence both conversational and Web3-native.

Shop AI is a trust-first interface for Agentic Commerce that tackles the hallucination problem in retail transactions. Using a coordinated swarm of agents, a Semantic Planner and a Visual Navigator. We autonomously resolve links, identify the main product on retailer sites, and facilitate purchases. The final transaction occurs only after user verification of the visual result, ensuring accountability alongside autonomy.

BestPath turns vague plans into optimized routes. Just tell it what you need—groceries, coffee, a gym—and it finds the best path using live map data. No more hunting for addresses or shuffling locations like in Google Maps, and no more outdated or useless information like with LLMs. It’s fast, smart, and built for the real-world.

NEXUS AI Compliance Council - Presentation Script Slide 1: Title Slide [Duration: 30 seconds] Script: "Good [morning/afternoon] everyone. Thank you for being here today. I'm excited to introduce you to NEXUS - an AI-powered compliance council that's revolutionizing how businesses make complex decisions. NEXUS uses cutting-edge multi-agent AI technology to provide comprehensive analysis from multiple expert perspectives simultaneously. Let's dive in." Delivery Notes: Speak with confidence and enthusiasm Make eye contact with the audience Pause briefly after "NEXUS" for emphasis Smile and establish rapport Slide 2: The Compliance Dilemma [Duration: 1 minute] Script: "Let's start by acknowledging a challenge every business faces. When making critical decisions, you need expertise across multiple domains - legal, financial, and strategic. But here's the problem: legal compliance often conflicts with aggressive growth strategies. Tax implications get overlooked until it's too late. And no single expert has the complete picture. Traditional consulting? It's slow and expensive. By the time you get all the experts in a room, coordinate their schedules, and synthesize their conflicting opinions, opportunities have already passed you by. There has to be a better way." Delivery Notes: Use a concerned, problem-focused tone Emphasize "slow and expensive" Pause after each bullet point Build tension around the problem Slide 3: Introducing NEXUS [Duration: 45 seconds] Script: "That better way is NEXUS. NEXUS is a multi-agent AI system specifically designed for business compliance deliberation. Instead of waiting weeks for consultants, you get three specialized AI agents that debate and analyze your questions in real-time. Built on the SpoonOS framework, NEXUS provides comprehensive analysis from multiple perspectives, generates blockchain-verified audit trails for regulatory compliance, and delivers all of this in minutes, not weeks." Delivery Notes: Shift to an optimistic, solution-focused tone Emphasize "real-time" and "minutes, not weeks" Show excitement about the solution Gesture toward the screen when saying "NEXUS" Slide 4: Meet the Council [Duration: 1 minute 15 seconds] Script: "Now let me introduce you to the three members of your AI compliance council. Think of them as your personal board of advisors, available 24/7. First, we have Dr. Miranda Blackstone - our Legal Scholar. She brings over 20 years of compliance experience, specializing in GDPR and international regulations. Miranda is risk-averse by design, always citing specific laws and identifying potential blockers. Next is Harold P. Pennywhistle, our Tax Comptroller. Harold is obsessed with tax optimization and financial exposure. He analyzes every dollar-level impact and ensures you understand the financial implications of every decision. Finally, there's Blake 'Rocket' Morrison - our Growth Hacker. Blake has an aggressive, move-fast mentality. He prioritizes market capture and isn't afraid to push boundaries strategically. Blake makes sure compliance doesn't kill innovation." Delivery Notes: Point to each agent as you introduce them Use slightly different vocal tones for each character Smile when introducing "Rocket" Show the diversity of perspectives Slide 5: Legal Scholar Deep Dive [Duration: 45 seconds] Script: "Let's look more closely at Dr. Blackstone. As our Chief Compliance Officer, she specializes in GDPR and data privacy regulations, international labor laws, corporate governance, and regulatory risk assessment. Miranda's approach is thorough and cautious. She cites specific laws and precedents, identifies legal risks before they become problems, and recommends compliant alternatives. Her motto? 'Better safe than sued.' And honestly, you want someone like her on your team." Delivery Notes: Adopt a more serious, authoritative tone Emphasize legal expertise Read the quote with gravitas Acknowledge the value of caution Slide 6: Tax Comptroller Deep Dive [Duration: 45 seconds] Script: "Harold Pennywhistle serves as our Chief Financial Watchdog. His expertise includes tax nexus implications across multiple states, financial exposure analysis, and detailed cost-benefit calculations. Harold calculates the dollar-level impact of every decision, identifies tax optimization opportunities you might have missed, and warns you about hidden costs before they bite. His philosophy? 'A penny saved is a lawsuit avoided.' He keeps your financial house in order while protecting you legally." Delivery Notes: Use a pragmatic, numbers-focused tone Emphasize "dollar-level" and "hidden costs" Deliver the quote with a slight smile Show respect for financial prudence Slide 7: Growth Hacker Deep Dive [Duration: 45 seconds] Script: "And then we have Blake Morrison - our Chief Growth Advocate. Blake specializes in rapid market expansion, competitive positioning, risk-reward optimization, and disruptive strategies. Blake's approach? He prioritizes speed and market capture, challenges conservative thinking when appropriate, and pushes boundaries strategically. His motto is 'Ask forgiveness, not permission.' Now, before you worry - Blake doesn't ignore compliance. He just ensures that legal and financial caution don't paralyze your growth. He provides the counterbalance every business needs." Delivery Notes: Use an energetic, dynamic tone Show enthusiasm for innovation Emphasize "counterbalance" Acknowledge both sides of the equation Slide 8: How NEXUS Works [Duration: 1 minute 30 seconds] Script: "So how does NEXUS actually work? The process is elegantly simple. Step one: You submit your compliance question - anything from 'Should we open an office in Germany?' to 'Can we hire contractors in California?' Step two: All three agents analyze your question simultaneously in parallel. They're working at the same time, not sequentially, so you get answers fast. Step three: The debate rounds begin. This is where the magic happens. Over two rounds of deliberation, the agents respond to each other's positions, challenge assumptions, and refine their analysis. Miranda might raise a legal concern, Harold calculates the cost, and Blake pushes back with a strategic alternative. Step four: NEXUS synthesizes all perspectives into a final decision, including consensus level and any dissenting opinions. You get the full picture, not just one viewpoint. Step five: The system generates an immutable audit trail with a SHA-256 hash, ready for blockchain verification. This is crucial for regulatory compliance and accountability." Delivery Notes: Walk through each step deliberately Use hand gestures to show progression Emphasize "parallel" and "debate" Show excitement about the synthesis Stress the importance of the audit trail Slide 9: Technical Architecture [Duration: 1 minute] Script: "For the technically minded in the audience, NEXUS is built on the SpoonOS framework, which is specifically designed for multi-agent orchestration. At the foundation, we have BaseAgent - each council member extends this with custom implementations tailored to their expertise. StateGraph orchestrates the entire debate workflow, managing both parallel and sequential execution seamlessly. GraphAgent handles execution management and state preservation across deliberations, ensuring continuity and context. And our Memory System maintains conversation context so each agent remembers previous discussions and builds on them. The architecture is robust, scalable, and designed for real-world enterprise use." Delivery Notes: Speak to technical audience members Don't rush through technical terms Show confidence in the architecture Acknowledge this may be detail-heavy for some Slide 10: Real-World Use Cases [Duration: 1 minute 30 seconds] Script: "Let me show you NEXUS in action with three real-world scenarios. Scenario one: 'Should we open an office in Germany with 5 employees?' Miranda immediately flags GDPR compliance requirements and German labor law implications. Harold analyzes the German tax nexus and payroll obligations - and they're complex. Meanwhile, Blake highlights the market opportunity and access to European talent. NEXUS synthesizes all three perspectives into actionable guidance. Scenario two: 'Can we hire contractors in California as a Delaware C-Corp?' This is where NEXUS really shines. Miranda warns about AB5 compliance and misclassification risks - California is notoriously strict. Harold calculates California nexus implications and ongoing costs. Blake weighs the flexibility benefits against compliance costs. The result? You make an informed decision, not a costly mistake. Scenario three: 'Should we process EU customer data in US servers?' Miranda cites specific GDPR articles - Articles 44 through 50 on international transfers. Harold notes minimal direct tax impact. Blake sees cost savings but acknowledges the legal exposure. NEXUS gives you the complete risk-reward analysis." Delivery Notes: Make scenarios relatable and real Show how agents complement each other Emphasize avoiding "costly mistakes" Use vocal variety for each agent's perspective Slide 11: Blockchain Audit Trail [Duration: 1 minute] Script: "One of NEXUS's most powerful features is the immutable compliance record. Every decision generates a verifiable audit trail. We create a SHA-256 hash - a deterministic fingerprint of the complete debate. This gets stored on the blockchain, creating a permanent, tamper-proof record. Anyone can independently verify the audit's integrity, which is crucial for regulatory compliance. Each audit report includes a timestamp, decision summary, consensus level, any dissenting opinions, and the blockchain transaction ID. If regulators ever question your decision-making process, you have cryptographic proof of your due diligence. This isn't just good practice - in many regulated industries, it's becoming essential." Delivery Notes: Emphasize "tamper-proof" and "verifiable" Show the value for compliance Use confident tone about blockchain Stress regulatory importance Slide 12: Web Dashboard & API [Duration: 1 minute] Script: "NEXUS offers flexibility in how you access it. For hands-on users, we have an interactive web dashboard with real-time deliberation visualization. You can watch the agents debate in real-time, review session history, replay past deliberations, and generate audit trails on demand. Just run 'python web_app.py' and you're up and running. For developers and enterprise integrations, we provide a complete REST API. Submit queries programmatically, mint blockchain audits, verify audit integrity, and retrieve session details - all through simple API endpoints. This means NEXUS can integrate directly into your existing workflows and applications." Delivery Notes: Show both user types are supported Emphasize ease of use Highlight "real-time" visualization Show integration possibilities Slide 13: Key Features & Benefits [Duration: 1 minute 15 seconds] Script: "Let me summarize why organizations are choosing NEXUS. Speed and efficiency: You get instant analysis from three expert perspectives. What used to take days or weeks now takes minutes. Your team can move faster with confidence. Comprehensive coverage: Legal, tax, and growth strategy all in one system. No blind spots, no missed implications, no surprises down the road. Cost effectiveness: NEXUS costs a fraction of traditional consulting fees. Unlimited deliberations with consistent quality. No hourly rates, no scheduling conflicts, no geographical limitations. Audit ready: Those blockchain-verified decision trails provide regulatory compliance documentation. When auditors come knocking, you're ready. And it's customizable: Add new agents for specific domains, modify debate workflows as your needs evolve. NEXUS grows with your organization." Delivery Notes: Emphasize value proposition clearly Use hand gestures for each benefit Show excitement about ROI Build toward conclusion Slide 14: Technology Stack & Setup [Duration: 1 minute] Script: "For those interested in implementation, NEXUS is surprisingly straightforward. You need Python 3.10 or higher, the SpoonOS framework, and an API key from your chosen LLM provider. Speaking of which, NEXUS supports multiple providers: OpenAI's GPT-4, Anthropic's Claude, Google's Gemini, or even local models through Ollama. You choose what works best for your security and cost requirements. Setup is simple: clone the repository, install dependencies with pip, configure your environment variables, and run your first query. We're talking minutes to get started, not days. And here's the best part: NEXUS is open source under the MIT license. You can examine the code, customize it for your needs, and contribute back to the community. Find it on GitHub at the URL shown here." Delivery Notes: Reassure about ease of implementation Show flexibility in LLM choice Emphasize "minutes to get started" Highlight open-source value Slide 15: Questions & Thank You [Duration: Variable] Script: "That brings us to the end of our presentation. NEXUS is here to help you make better business decisions by combining legal expertise, financial analysis, and growth strategy in a single, AI-powered system. The three agents - our legal scholar, tax comptroller, and growth hacker - work together to give you perspectives you need, when you need them. You can find the complete project on GitHub at the URL shown here. The code is open source, the documentation is comprehensive, and the community is growing. Now, I'd love to hear from you. What questions do you have? What compliance challenges is your organization facing that NEXUS might help solve?"
Automated OS and Browser with phone and Mac app

High-dimensional complex system simulations in modern science and engineering relies heavily on time-consuming trial-and-error parameter adjustment. Experts often need to repeatedly try for days or even weeks to find the appropriate parameter configuration. This process lacks systematic guidance and is full of repetitive labor. We are building an "agentic" AI collaborative researcher to transform this workflow through intelligent parameter recommendation and optimization: by intelligently summarizing literature to provide theoretical basis for parameter setting, automatically recommending and iteratively optimizing parameter configuration based on simulation results, reducing repetitive manual labor, and accelerating the process of scientific discovery.

AI-Augmented Research Paper Reviewer — an autonomous agentic system that evaluates scientific papers with the depth of a peer reviewer, the speed of an LLM, and the reach of millions of published papers.

Aurora is an AI-powered neuroscience system that automatically discovers and interprets the hidden structure of cognition from brain signals. Instead of manual analysis or simple classification, our SpoonOS-native platform uses multi-agent orchestration to build hierarchical cognitive manifolds, retrieve relevant scientific literature in real-time, and generate scientifically grounded hypotheses—essentially creating an automated neuroscientist that turns raw neural data into interpretable, literature-backed insights.
Understand Any Dish Anywhere

Path Finder is an agentic, voice-first AI career advisor to help college students find accurate career matches and informed career choices. Our app works by having the student have a conversation with an AI voice agent, while a multi-agent system running on SpoonOS performs real-time personality inference, skill extraction, and goal modeling from a natural conversation. The agents then collaborate to produce a ranked career path list backed by confidence scores, actionable steps, curated resources, job simulations, and real-world mentor matches.
A fully autonomous AI agent built with SpoonOS that monitors your wallet, decides buy/sell using simple rules, and executes real trades, no approval needed.
Autonomous quant AI marketplace where strategies trade live, self-tune indicators, switch by regime, ingest news every 30s, and enforce risk—hands-off finance.
